body.name: UNBREAKcable Shatterproof Tempered Glass Screen Protector for iPhone 12/12 Pro [2-Pack] [Easy Installation Frame] [9H Hardness] [99.99% HD Clear] [Bubble Free] for Apple 6.1''

features: 🥇【Perfect fit for iPhone 12/12 Pro】2 Pack 9H tempered glass screen protector exclusively designed for Apple iPhone 12/ 12 Pro 6.1“ (2020). 💗Please noted💗 [Our shatterproof screen protector is designed to be slightly smaller than the actual display screen, It has an open-edge design] so this tempered glass screen protector won’t interfere with Face ID or with the front camera function, which makes it case friendly and prevents bubbling and peeling around the edges.

💎【Double Shatterproof Protection】Made from superior 9H tempered glass is highly durable and scratch-resistant, reinforced ​to be twice as strong as other ordinary tempered films on the market, your screen would survive a drop from a height of 6 feet (1.8 meters) to a hard surface, while its edges will not break easily. This iPhone 12/12 Pro glass screen protector is exceptionally safe to use.

👍【10s Super-easy Installation】The screen protector for iphone 12/ 12 Pro includes all accessories necessary for a successful installation - 1 Installation frame, 3 alcohol wipes, 3 electrostatic dust removal stickers, 2 dust removal stickers, 1 microfiber cloth & detailed installation guide. The installation frame enables perfect alignment of the best iPhone 12 /12 pro glass screen protectors. You can successfully install this screen protector in 10 seconds, even with no previous experience.

👍【100% Bare Screen Experience & Ultra HD】This iPhone 12 pro glass screen protector is rigid but ultra-thin. The thickness of only 0.01inch makes you hardly feel its presence on the iPhone screen. 99.9% high-density glass material brings 100% clarity improvement, highly restore the best visual feast brought by the iPhone screen. Silky smooth touch feeling also give you a sensitive respond. You can wake up iPhone within 0.01s.Bring you the most natural iPhone viewing and 3D sensitive touch.

👍【Bubble free & Anti-fingerprint】Thanks to its auto-adsorption technology, the UNBREAKable iPhone 12 tempered glass screen protector/ iPhone 12 Pro tempered glass screen protector can self-expel any air bubbles. The surface of the protective film is treated with a plasma oleophobic coating, which is very smooth, effectively prevent fingerprints from sweat and grease, making the screen very easy to clean. The perfect crystal spotless experience makes you unwilling to stop.

💗【Exclusive Lifetime Warranty Service】Our philosophy is to serve every customer. Whatever the issue you meet, feel free to contact us to find a satisfying solution. We provide 36 Months warranty and lifetime support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Made from Superior 9H Tempered Glass - Highly Durable and Scratch-Resistant
Silky Smooth Touch Feeling- Brings 100% Bare Screen Experience

Warm Reminder: UNBREAKcable Shatterproof Designed for iPhone 12 / 12 Pro Screen Protector - Compatible with Apple 6.1'' 2020. Please confirm your phone model before you purchase. How drop-resistant are our UNBREAKcable iPhone 12 screen protector? Every single piece of the UNBREAKcable iPhone 12 screen protector/ iPhone 12 Pro screen protector has passed a 9H pencil test and a 10.4 kg / 23 lbs pressure test. As a result, this tempered glass screen protector keeps your display intact and flawless daily, preventing any scratches, scrapes or cracks. What are the features? Super easy installation, 9H hardness, Shatterproof, Shockproof, Anti-scratches, Anti-fingerprints, HD(99.99% transparency), and bubble-free, etc. These features make the UNBREAKcable screen protector the best shield for your iPhone 12/12 pro screen. What can we do? UNBREAKcable provides super protection for your screen and exclusive professional service. If you encounter any problems below when you are using UNBREAKcable Screen Protector, UNBREAKcable will send you a New One: (1) Broken/Crack (2) Air bubbles (3) Doesn't fit your phone Additional information you might want to know: Q1: What is the specialty of this screen protector compared with much cheaper ones? A1: Our screen protector made with superior 9H tempered glass is highly durable and scratch-resistant, reinforced ​to be twice as strong as other ordinary tempered films on the market. 10s Super-easy Installed Auto Alignment Kit makes your installation easier than ever. This screen protector utilizes automatic adsorption technology to ensure that no bubbles can exist during the installation process. Q2: Is it sensitive to touch? Does it affect the facial-ID function? 100% HD? A2: Yes, It's sensitive. It has an open-edge design, so it won’t interfere with Face ID or with the front camera function. You can unlock as fast as 0.01s. 99.9% high-density glass material brings 100% clarity improvement, which offers you an optimal, natural viewing experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Protection
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the protector as well as the installation kit is impressive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works very well
reviews.reviewText: It's been a little over a year and I just took off the first one and installed the second. While using the first one, my screen got a few minor scratches because I drop my phone all the time, but today I dropped my phone, and a small part of it was completely shattered, so I knew it was time. When I removed the screen protector? Not a single scratch on my phone. It looks just like it did when I bought it brand new. It's easy to install too. Definitely buying it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I liked the fact that it was a easy to install screen protector for my Iphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Undecided if I like it
reviews.reviewText: It looks great and clear but it 100% cracks way easier than your screen would. So every time I use one I’m sure it cracks with in a week and then just deal with my screen looking cracked anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good instructions and supplies to make application efficient.
reviews.reviewText: I like the product so far. No issues, easy installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As described , good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Comes with a little application guide that you can pop on your phone so the protector is perfectly centered. Definitely not shatter proof, but when it is cracked it doesn't flake off little pieces of glass. Average screen protector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love that it had a framing guide included so that I could line up the screen protector easily
reviews.reviewText: UnbreakCable screen protector for the iPhone 12 pro had an easy guide and instructions. It went on really easily without allowing bubbles as much as some others. I started from the top, and it just laid down nice and easily, and I pressed it down with the static free lens cloth that was included. One bubble that formed at the bottom came out before I had press the whole thing down quick and easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 12, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Ich habe dieses Glas schon öfters für vorherige Handys gekauft und bin jedes Mal zufrieden. Einfaches Aufbringen durch den mitgelieferten Rahmen,
Serve più che bene per l'utilizzo previsto, buon prezzo, non difficile da installare con qualche attenzione, ancora in uso dopo lungo tempo.
Arrivé rapidement, facile installation, prix correct

Despues de probar otras marcas decir que esta para mi es la mejor! Yo llevo la funda Quadlock y los otros protectores se me despegaban de los bordes. Y este queda perfecto. Tema durabilidad ya lo veré con el tiempo.
